name: Smoky Lentil and Sweet Potato Tacos
description: These smoky lentil and sweet potato tacos come together quick and easy for a vegetarian weeknight meal. Packed inside gluten-free blue corn tortillas, it is healthy and flavorful. Change up the sweet potatoes for any vegetable that is in season to make this any time of year!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp chipotle chili powder (or 1 chipotle chili in adobo sauce, chopped)
a generous dash of black pepper
1 Tbsp tomato paste (or 1/2 large ripe tomato, finely chopped)
a dash of liquid smoke (optional, for extra smokiness)
hard or soft tacos (I used gluten-free blue corn tortillas)
salsa of choice (I used pico de gallo)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the lentils for half an hour. Chop up the potatoes, get the ingredients ready. Drain the lentils, wash, and keep ready.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the lentils for half an hour. Chop up the potatoes, get the ingredients ready. Drain the lentils, wash, and keep ready.

recipeInstructions.text: In a deep pan, add oil and heat on medium heat. Add onion and cook until golden (5 to 6 mins).
recipeInstructions.name: In a deep pan, add oil and heat on medium heat. Add onion and cook until golden (5 to 6 mins).

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the spices, herbs, salt, pepper, tomato paste/tomato, and mix well. Cook for a minute (2-3 minutes if using a tomato).
recipeInstructions.name: Add all the spices, herbs, salt, pepper, tomato paste/tomato, and mix well. Cook for a minute (2-3 minutes if using a tomato).

recipeInstructions.text: Add the washed lentils and water. Mix, cover, and cook on low-medium heat for 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the washed lentils and water. Mix, cover, and cook on low-medium heat for 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cubed sweet potato, Sriracha, mix, and cook covered for another 15-25 minutes until lentils and sweet potato are tender and all liquid is absorbed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cubed sweet potato, Sriracha, mix, and cook covered for another 15-25 minutes until lentils and sweet potato are tender and all liquid is absorbed.

recipeInstructions.text: Add lime juice, taste, and adjust for salt and spice. Add a dash of liquid smoke for extra smokiness.
recipeInstructions.name: Add lime juice, taste, and adjust for salt and spice. Add a dash of liquid smoke for extra smokiness.

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the taco shells, then load them with the warm lentil mixture, lettuce/cabbage, fresh salsa, avocado, jalapeno, cilantro, and lime juice. Serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm the taco shells, then load them with the warm lentil mixture, lettuce/cabbage, fresh salsa, avocado, jalapeno, cilantro, and lime juice. Serve immediately.

keywords: lentil and sweet potato tacos recipe, smoky lentil and sweet potato tacos
